00019     ON_CBN_SELCHANGE( IDC_MSGNEW_CBO_PROTOCOL, OnCbnSelChangeMsgProtocol )

00028 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00029 CTxtMsgNewDlg::CTxtMsgNewDlg
00030     (
00031     CWnd                * aParent,
00032     FmiApplicationLayer & aCom
00033     )
00034     : CDialog( IDD_TXT_MSG_NEW, aParent )
00035     , mCom( aCom )
00036     , mMessageText( _T("") )
00037     , mMessageProtocol( 0 )
00038 #if FMI_SUPPORT_A602
00039     , mMessageId( _T("") )
00040 #endif
00041 #if FMI_SUPPORT_A604
00042     , mMessageType( A604_MESSAGE_TYPE_NORMAL )
00043     , mDisplayImmediately( FALSE )
00044 #endif
00045 {
00046 }

00055 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00058 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00059 void CTxtMsgNewDlg::DoDataExchange
00060     (
00061     CDataExchange * aDataExchange
00062     )
00063 {
00064     CDialog::DoDataExchange( aDataExchange );
00065     DDX_Text( aDataExchange, IDC_MSGNEW_EDIT_MESSAGE_TEXT, mMessageText );
00066     DDX_CBIndex( aDataExchange, IDC_MSGNEW_CBO_PROTOCOL, mMessageProtocol );
00067 #if FMI_SUPPORT_A602
00068     DDX_Text( aDataExchange, IDC_MSGNEW_EDIT_MSG_ID, mMessageId );
00069 #endif
00070 #if( FMI_SUPPORT_A604 )
00071     DDX_Check( aDataExchange, IDC_MSGNEW_CHK_DISP_IMMED, mDisplayImmediately );
00072 #endif
00073 }

00075 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00080 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00081 BOOL CTxtMsgNewDlg::OnInitDialog()
00082 {
00083     CDialog::OnInitDialog();
00084 
00085     CComboBox * comboBox = (CComboBox *)GetDlgItem( IDC_MSGNEW_CBO_PROTOCOL );
00086 
00087 // This must match the MessageProtocolType private enum.
00088 #if( FMI_SUPPORT_A604 )
00089     comboBox->AddString( _T("A604 - Open Text Message") );
00090     comboBox->AddString( _T("A604 - Canned Response Text Message") );
00091 #endif
00092 #if( FMI_SUPPORT_A602 )
00093     comboBox->AddString( _T("A602 - Open Text Message") );
00094     comboBox->AddString( _T("A602 - Simple Okay Acknowledge") );
00095     comboBox->AddString( _T("A602 - Yes/No Confirmation") );
00096 #endif
00097 #if( FMI_SUPPORT_LEGACY )
00098     comboBox->AddString( _T("Legacy Text Message") );
00099 #endif
00100 
00101     ASSERT( comboBox->GetCount() == MESSAGE_PROTOCOL_CNT );
00102     comboBox->SetCurSel( 0 );
00103     updateDlgFields( 0 );
00104 
00105 return TRUE;
00106 } /* OnInitDialog() */

00108 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00115 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00116 void CTxtMsgNewDlg::OnBnClickedOk()
00117 {
00118     UpdateData( TRUE );
00119     char  messageText[200];
00120 
00121 #if( FMI_SUPPORT_A602 )
00122     MessageId messageId;
00123 #endif
00124 
00125     WideCharToMultiByte( mCom.mClientCodepage, 0, mMessageText.GetBuffer(), -1, messageText, 200, NULL, NULL );
00126     messageText[199] = '\0';
00127 
00128 #if( FMI_SUPPORT_A602 )
00129     messageId = MessageId( mMessageId, mCom.mClientCodepage );
00130 #endif
00131 
00132 #if( FMI_SUPPORT_A604 )
00133     // if message ID was left blank for a protocol that has a
00134     // message ID, ask the user to confirm that a blank message
00135     // ID is really desired; if the user selects No, don't send
00136     // the message
00137     if( 0 == messageId.getIdSize() &&
00138         ( A604_OPEN_MESSAGE_PROTOCOL       == mMessageProtocol ||
00139           A602_OK_ACK_MESSAGE_PROTOCOL     == mMessageProtocol ||
00140           A602_YES_NO_ACK_MESSAGE_PROTOCOL == mMessageProtocol ) )
00141     {
00142         int response;
00143         response = MessageBox
00144                     (
00145                     _T("The message ID field is empty.  If you continue, message status will not be available for this message.  Do you want to continue?"),
00146                     _T("Message ID Is Empty"),
00147                     MB_YESNO
00148                     );
00149         if( IDNO == response )
00150         {
00151             return;
00152         }
00153     }
00154 #endif
00155 
00156 #if FMI_SUPPORT_A604
00157     //set the mMessageType based on the user options
00158     if( mDisplayImmediately )
00159         mMessageType = A604_MESSAGE_TYPE_DISP_IMMEDIATE;
00160     else
00161         mMessageType = A604_MESSAGE_TYPE_NORMAL;
00162 #endif
00163 
00164     //see which protocol was selected and send appropriately
00165     switch( mMessageProtocol )
00166         {
00167 #if( FMI_SUPPORT_A604 )
00168         case A604_OPEN_MESSAGE_PROTOCOL:    //A604 open
00169             mCom.sendA604TextMessage( messageText, messageId, mMessageType );
00170             break;
00171         case A604_CANNED_RESPONSE_MESSAGE_PROTOCOL:    // Canned Response
00172             {
00173             CSelectCannedResponseDlg dlg( messageId, messageText, mMessageType, this, mCom );
00174             if( dlg.DoModal() == IDCANCEL )
00175                 return;
00176             }
00177             break;
00178 #endif
00179 #if( FMI_SUPPORT_A602 )
00180         case A602_OPEN_MESSAGE_PROTOCOL:    //A602 Open
00181             mCom.sendA602TextMessage( FMI_ID_SERVER_OPEN_TXT_MSG, messageText, messageId );
00182             break;
00183         case A602_OK_ACK_MESSAGE_PROTOCOL:    //Okay Ack
00184             mCom.sendA602TextMessage( FMI_ID_SERVER_OK_ACK_TXT_MSG, messageText, messageId );
00185             break;
00186         case A602_YES_NO_ACK_MESSAGE_PROTOCOL:    //Yes/No Ack
00187             mCom.sendA602TextMessage( FMI_ID_SERVER_YES_NO_CONFIRM_MSG, messageText, messageId );
00188             break;
00189 #endif
00190 #if( FMI_SUPPORT_LEGACY )
00191         case LEGACY_TEXT_MESSAGE_PROTOCOL: // Legacy text message
00192             mCom.sendLegacyTextMessage( messageText );
00193             break;
00194 #endif
00195         default:
00196             MessageBox
00197                 (
00198                 _T("The message type you have selected is not available."),
00199                 _T("Unsupported"), MB_OK
00200                 );
00201             return;
00202             break;
00203         }
00204 
00205     OnOK();
00206 }    /* OnBnClickedOk() */
00207 
00208 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00212 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00213 void CTxtMsgNewDlg::OnCbnSelChangeMsgProtocol()
00214 {
00215     UpdateData( TRUE );
00216     updateDlgFields( mMessageProtocol );
00217 }
00218 
00219 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00226 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00227 void CTxtMsgNewDlg::updateDlgFields
00228     (
00229     int aSelectedProtocol
00230     )
00231 {
00232     switch( aSelectedProtocol )
00233     {
00234 #if( FMI_SUPPORT_A604 )
00235     case A604_OPEN_MESSAGE_PROTOCOL:
00236         GetDlgItem( IDC_MSGNEW_CHK_DISP_IMMED )->EnableWindow( TRUE );
00237         GetDlgItem( IDC_MSGNEW_LBL_CANRSP_HINT )->ShowWindow( SW_HIDE );
00238         GetDlgItem( IDC_MSGNEW_LBL_MSG_ID )->EnableWindow( TRUE );
00239         GetDlgItem( IDC_MSGNEW_LBL_MSG_ID_HINT )->EnableWindow( TRUE );
00240         GetDlgItem( IDC_MSGNEW_EDIT_MSG_ID )->EnableWindow( TRUE );
00241         break;
00242     case A604_CANNED_RESPONSE_MESSAGE_PROTOCOL:
00243         GetDlgItem( IDC_MSGNEW_CHK_DISP_IMMED )->EnableWindow( TRUE );
00244         GetDlgItem( IDC_MSGNEW_LBL_CANRSP_HINT )->ShowWindow( SW_SHOW );
00245         GetDlgItem( IDC_MSGNEW_LBL_MSG_ID )->EnableWindow( TRUE );
00246         GetDlgItem( IDC_MSGNEW_LBL_MSG_ID_HINT )->EnableWindow( TRUE );
00247         GetDlgItem( IDC_MSGNEW_EDIT_MSG_ID )->EnableWindow( TRUE );
00248         break;
00249 #endif
00250 #if( FMI_SUPPORT_A602 )
00251     case A602_OPEN_MESSAGE_PROTOCOL:
00252         GetDlgItem( IDC_MSGNEW_CHK_DISP_IMMED )->EnableWindow( FALSE );
00253         GetDlgItem( IDC_MSGNEW_LBL_CANRSP_HINT )->ShowWindow( SW_HIDE );
00254         GetDlgItem( IDC_MSGNEW_LBL_MSG_ID )->EnableWindow( FALSE );
00255         GetDlgItem( IDC_MSGNEW_LBL_MSG_ID_HINT )->EnableWindow( FALSE );
00256         GetDlgItem( IDC_MSGNEW_EDIT_MSG_ID )->EnableWindow( FALSE );
00257         break;
00258     case A602_OK_ACK_MESSAGE_PROTOCOL:
00259         GetDlgItem( IDC_MSGNEW_CHK_DISP_IMMED )->EnableWindow( FALSE );
00260         GetDlgItem( IDC_MSGNEW_LBL_CANRSP_HINT )->ShowWindow( SW_HIDE );
00261         GetDlgItem( IDC_MSGNEW_LBL_MSG_ID )->EnableWindow( TRUE );
00262         GetDlgItem( IDC_MSGNEW_LBL_MSG_ID_HINT )->EnableWindow( TRUE );
00263         GetDlgItem( IDC_MSGNEW_EDIT_MSG_ID )->EnableWindow( TRUE );
00264         break;
00265     case A602_YES_NO_ACK_MESSAGE_PROTOCOL:
00266         GetDlgItem( IDC_MSGNEW_CHK_DISP_IMMED )->EnableWindow( FALSE );
00267         GetDlgItem( IDC_MSGNEW_LBL_CANRSP_HINT )->ShowWindow( SW_HIDE );
00268         GetDlgItem( IDC_MSGNEW_LBL_MSG_ID )->EnableWindow( TRUE );
00269         GetDlgItem( IDC_MSGNEW_LBL_MSG_ID_HINT )->EnableWindow( TRUE );
00270         GetDlgItem( IDC_MSGNEW_EDIT_MSG_ID )->EnableWindow( TRUE );
00271         break;
00272 #endif
00273 #if( FMI_SUPPORT_LEGACY )
00274     case LEGACY_TEXT_MESSAGE_PROTOCOL:
00275         GetDlgItem( IDC_MSGNEW_CHK_DISP_IMMED )->EnableWindow( FALSE );
00276         GetDlgItem( IDC_MSGNEW_LBL_CANRSP_HINT )->ShowWindow( SW_HIDE );
00277         GetDlgItem( IDC_MSGNEW_LBL_MSG_ID )->EnableWindow( FALSE );
00278         GetDlgItem( IDC_MSGNEW_LBL_MSG_ID_HINT )->EnableWindow( FALSE );
00279         GetDlgItem( IDC_MSGNEW_EDIT_MSG_ID )->EnableWindow( FALSE );
00280         break;
00281 #endif
00282     }
00283 
00284     OnEnChangeEditFields();
00285 
00286 }    /* updateDlgFields() */
00287 
00288 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00293 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00294 void CTxtMsgNewDlg::OnEnChangeEditFields()
00295 {
00296     BOOL formValid = TRUE;
00297 
00298 #if( !( SKIP_VALIDATION ) )
00299     UpdateData( TRUE );
00300 #if( FMI_SUPPORT_A604 )
00301     if( mMessageProtocol == A604_CANNED_RESPONSE_MESSAGE_PROTOCOL && mMessageId == "" )
00302     {
00303         formValid = FALSE;
00304     }
00305 #endif
00306     if( ( mMessageText.GetLength() == 0   ) ||
00307         ( mMessageText.GetLength() >= 200 ) )
00308     {
00309         formValid = FALSE;
00310     }
00311 #endif
00312 
00313     if( formValid )
00314     {
00315         GetDlgItem( IDOK )->EnableWindow( TRUE );
00316     }
00317     else
00318     {
00319         GetDlgItem( IDOK )->EnableWindow( FALSE );
00320     }
00321 
00322 }    /* OnEnChangeEditFields */
